title: Inconsistent extensions listing

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

Inconsistent list of Quarkus extensions when running `mvn  quarkus:list-extensions` or `quarkus extension list -i`

Some of the entries have `✬` prefix, some do not have. Seems that Quarkus core ones have the prefix, the rest from the platform doesn't. I expect all of them to have the same prefix.

```
...
✬ quarkus-spring-security                            Quarkus Extension for Spring Security API
✬ quarkus-spring-web                                 Quarkus Extension for Spring Web API
  quarkus-tekton-client                              Quarkiverse - Tekton Client - Runtime
  quarkus-tika                                       Apache Tika
✬ quarkus-undertow                                   Undertow Servlet
  quarkus-univocity-parsers                          Univocity Parsers
  quarkus-unleash                                    Quarkus - Unleash - Runtime
✬ quarkus-vault                                      Vault
✬ quarkus-vertx                                      Eclipse Vert.x
✬ quarkus-vertx-graphql                              Eclipse Vert.x GraphQL
...
```

### Expected behavior

All the entries have the same prefix

### Actual behavior

Some of the entries have `✬` prefix, some do not have

### How to Reproduce?

 - generate project using CLI or https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started#bootstrapping-the-project
 - list quarkus extensions - e.g. `mvn  quarkus:list-extensions` or `quarkus extension list -i`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS Monterey

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.5.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
